newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.Africa three-month T-bill average 15.65 pct.
newsitem.headline: S.Africa three-month T-bill average 15.65 pct.

text.p: The average discount rate for South African three-month Treasury Bills fell to 15.65 percent at the latest weekly tender after remaining unchanged at 15.70 percent last week, the Reserve Bank said.
Applications for the 800 million rand of bills on offer totalled 1.92 billion rand. The average price was 96.10 rand percent.

The average rate for six-month bills was 15.14 percent from 15.24 percent. Applications for the 300 million rand of bills on offer totalled 1.09 billion rand. The average price was 92.45 rand percent.
